metadata.title: CVE-2017-12132 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The DNS stub resolver in the GNU C Library (aka glibc or libc6) beforeversion 2.26, when EDNS support is enabled, will solicit large UDPresponses from name servers, potentially simplifying off-path DNS spoofingattacks due to IP fragmentation.

criterions.comment: eglibc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
